entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
